thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 3 of 138
thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I did not know Home Zone wasn't a commission based company, though customer service would say otherwise. Very knowledgeable and helpful staff. Our salesman, Micha, went out of his way to make sure we had the best deal on our very large purchase! We couldn't be happier with the service and can't wait to pick up our furniture in a little under a week.
